page.title: 07BRUNTON PARK
page.content: {Brunton Park}has a small shopping centre situated on Davenport Drive. There is a{Leeds Building Society,}an estate agent, a Liptons food store,a Pharmacy, a post office,a home bakery, a butchers, a hairdressers,newsagents, an all purpose store called Henleys, a bathroom fitment shop called Nu-Look. On Princes Road there is a fairly new church called{St. Aidens,}there is also a clinic, a{community centre,}and a public house called the Royal George. Only one bus service goes in to Brunton Park,the number 46. Brunton Park also has tennis courts, a sports field and a club. The area that was covered in Brunton Park is in the south-east corner of our twelve square miles.
